mapper.select: SELECT A.RSV_CD , A.FAC_CD , A.mem_no , A.RSV_ST , A.RSV_EN , B.MEM_NM FROM RESERVATION A, MEMBER B WHERE FAC_CD = #{facCd} AND A.mem_no = B.mem_no
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RESERVATION WHERE mem_no = #{memCd} AND RSV_ST = TO_DATE(#{rsvSt},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi')
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET RSV_ST = TO_DATE(#{newSt},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi') , RSV_EN = TO_DATE(#{newEn}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi') WHERE RSV_ST = TO_DATE(#{oldSt},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi') AND mem_no = #{memCd}
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(RSV_ST,'YY-MM-DD') AS RSV_ST, TO_CHAR(RSV_ST,'hh24:mi') ||'~'|| TO_CHAR(RSV_EN,'hh24:mi') AS RSV_EN FROM FACILITY A, RESERVATION B WHERE A.FAC_CD = B.FAC_CD AND B.mem_no = #{memCd} AND A.FAC_CD = #{facCd} ORDER BY RSV_ST DESC
